abstract: Anti-corruption investigation started by Chinese Pres Xi Jinping reveals Ma Jian, former vice minister of state security, used his position to benefit businessman Guo Wengui, and had six mistresses and Beijing villas; details of inquiry appear in respected newsmagazine Caixin and on Chinese state-run news websites.
lead_paragraph: The reports also said that the official, Ma Jian, a former vice minister of state security, had two sons by them and kept up to six villas in Beijing.

headline.main: Chinese Outlets Say Security Official in Graft Case Had 6 Mistresses
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; China: Report on Graft, and Mistresses

snippet: The reports also said that the official, Ma Jian, a former vice minister of state security, had two sons by them and kept up to six villas in Beijing.

keywords.value: Ministry of State Security of the People's Republic of China
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China
